subject: Business Ideas
body: Here are some business ideas for you to consider!

subject: Hello Great Meetings
body: Hey there, just wanted to say thanks for the great meeting and business conversation the other day!

subject: Follow Up
body: Following up on our conversation. Looking forward to working together!

subject: Networking Connection
body: Hi there! It was great connecting with you recently. I'd love to stay in touch and explore potential collaboration opportunities.

subject: Quick Check-in
body: Hope you're doing well! Just wanted to reach out and see how things are going on your end. Let me know if there's anything I can help with.

subject: Partnership Opportunity
body: I've been thinking about our recent discussion and believe there might be some interesting partnership opportunities we could explore together. Would love to chat more!
